attributes.action: end the right of conscience for health care workers; or at least ensure that this does not impact on the rights of patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition refers ONLY to procedures which affect the patient him/herself.  Information should be publicly, and easily, available as to the views of all health workers, in a specific area, on controversial medical procedures.  All patients should be completely free to choose a doctor or other medical professional on the basis of this information; and it should be MANDATORY for any health professional to refer any patient to a colleague if the patient requests a procedure which is contrary to the tenets of the specific medical professional.  Staff in A & E departments should not be permitted, under ANY circumstances, to allow their personal views to affect the treatment given to any patient presenting with an emergency.
